name: The Summoner (itch) (Nathan More, Ed Slee)
description:
**** This is a development build. Not intended for consumer use. Final game will be released sometime near the end of March ****

You have been called upon for a heroic deed. Brought to a strange island ripped from the Earth, you are charged with ridding the corruption that has turned the populace into monstrous beings. Pick up your sword and shield and fight your way to the floating castle where the source of the darkness awaits you! Slay the monsters in your way or capture their spirit and summon them to fight alongside you!
